org.multiverse.api.callables
Interface TxnIntCallable

public interface TxnIntCallable

A transactional callable contains the logic that needs to be executed transactionally and normally is executed by the TxnExecutor. This transactional callable is optimized for retuning a primitive type: int. Using this TxnIntCallable instead of the TxnCallable is that no object wrapper needs to be created and there is no reason to deal with a potential null value.

Author:
Peter Veentjer.

Method Summary
 int call(Txn txn)
          Executes the callable.

Returns:
the result of the execution.
Throws:
